name: All That Glitters Is Gold
description:
Plot

You've lived in a small town in the mountains all your life, sorrounded by the festivities of old times and the warmth of the people that lives there. Winter was allways hard, yet, it became harder and harder, to the point it was unberable. It never stoped, and it didn't look like it would.
You arm yourself with courage, and decide to go talk with the Gods at the Gods Altar, up in the mountain, under a never ending storm.
Will you stop this never ending winter?

Gamewise:

The first part comprehends a labyrinth, filled with clues to find the right path. Be careful! If you run into a dead end far too many times, you'll have to start from the begining again.

The second, on the other hand, is a matter of choosing the right options across the dialogue.

Endings:

There's only two endings, one good, one bad. Don't worry, the bad ending will give you a chance to restart from the second part onwards!
